mapper.select: SELECT "1" financeKind, c.id AS prdtId, c.bank_name AS financeName, c.card_name AS prdtName, c.card_image AS image, c.conn_status FROM card_history c_h JOIN card c ON c.id = c_h.card_id WHERE c.member_id = #{id} GROUP BY c.id, financeName, c.card_name, c.card_image UNION ALL SELECT "2" as financeKind, a_b.id AS prdtId, a_b.bank_name AS financeName, a_b.account_name AS prdtName, a_b.account_book_image AS image, a_b.conn_status FROM account_history a_h JOIN account_book a_b ON a_b.id = a_h.account_id WHERE a_b.member_id = #{id} GROUP BY a_b.id, financeName, a_b.account_name, a_b.account_book_image;
